title: 他校の氷姫を助けたら、お友達から始める事になりました
title_en: After Helping the Ice Princess from Another School, We Decided to Start as Friends

character_registry.Nagi: Shinonome Nagi (東雲凪) - The 'Ice Princess'. White hair, blue eyes, dignified and reserved. Adopted daughter of a prominent family. Male trauma from groping incident.
character_registry.Souta: Minori Souta (海以蒼太) - The protagonist. Ordinary-looking male student, kind-hearted, observant. Lives alone in Tokyo.
character_registry.Eiji: Makizaka Eiji (巻坂瑛二) - Souta's best friend. Outgoing, playful, dating Kirika.
character_registry.Kirika: Nishizawa Kirika (西沢桐花) - Eiji's girlfriend. Chestnut-colored wavy hair, cheerful personality.
character_registry.Hikaru: Hayama Hikaru (葉山ひかる) - Nagi's classmate and friend. Energetic, protective of Nagi.

illust-001.scene_context: First formal meeting on the train. Nagi sits next to Souta and greets him the morning after he saved her from the groper.
illust-001.visual_focus: Nagi's blue eyes and white hair as she greets Souta. Close proximity, intimate framing.

illust-002.scene_context: Mont Blanc jealousy scene. Nagi sees Souta eating parfait with Kirika (Eiji's girlfriend) through a café window. She misunderstands the relationship.
illust-002.visual_focus: Nagi witnessing Souta with another woman. Expression of hidden pain, heartbreak.
illust-002.spoiler_prevention_note: Illustration shows Nagi's anguished expression but text builds to this moment. Forecast mood, don't describe her tears/pain until text confirms.

illust-003.scene_context: Hayama making a punching gesture at Souta, playfully threatening him about treating Nagi well.

illust-004.scene_context: The 'It's a secret' scene. Nagi puts a finger to her lips and smiles mysteriously when Souta asks what she wants from him.
illust-004.visual_focus: Nagi's rare smile, finger to lips in 'shh' gesture. Eyes sparkling with hidden meaning.
illust-004.literary_significance: This is the moment Souta realizes he's falling for her. The illustration captures her breaking through her 'Ice Princess' facade.

illust-005.scene_context: Three piercing gazes directed at Souta.
